00008 //The ordering of the includes SVSInterop.h and SVSReader.h is important due to the error below.
00009 //      C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.0A\include\objidl.h(12364) : error C2872: 'BIND_OPTS' : ambiguous symbol
00010 //        could be 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.0A\include\objidl.h(1891) : tagBIND_OPTS BIND_OPTS'
00011 //        or       'c:\windows\microsoft.net\framework\v2.0.50727\mscorlib.dll : System::Runtime::InteropServices::BIND_OPTS'
00012 //This occurs because because the standard Windows headers (usually included from <windows.h> ) have a load of
00013 //#defines that clash with .NET.
00014 //Since the reader is unsing dbghelp we acutally need the windef defines. 
00015 #include "AperioFileManager.h"
00016 #include "AperioManagedReader.h"
00017

00022 void BigTiffDotNetReader::ImportImage(System::String ^filename, System::String^ basefilename)
00023 {
00024     GetSubImages(filename, basefilename);
00025 
00026     GetImageTiles( filename,  basefilename);
00027     
00028     std::string bc = "";
00029 
00030     SVSGetMetadata(filename,basefilename);
00031 }

00034 String^ BigTiffDotNetReader::GetExposure(String^ fileName)
00035 {
00036     _log->Debug("Calling BigTiffDotNetReader::getExposure on filename : "+ gcnew String(fileName) );
00037     bool isAperio;
00038     try 
00039     {
00040         char* chars =  (char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(fileName)).ToPointer();
00041         std::string ofileName="temp";
00042         std::string lfileName=chars;
00043         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(chars));
00044         AperioFileManager svsmgr(lfileName.c_str() );
00045         std::map<std::string,std::string> metadata= svsmgr.getMetadata(0);
00046         
00047         std::string Exposure_Scale="";
00048         std::string Exposure_Time="";
00049 
00050         for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator it = metadata.begin(); it != metadata.end(); it++)
00051         {
00052             std::string key = it->first.c_str();
00053             std::string val = it->second.c_str();
00054             std::cout<<key<<"   :   "<<val<<std::endl;
00055             if(key =="Exposure Scale")
00056                 Exposure_Scale = val;
00057             if(key =="Exposure Time")
00058                 Exposure_Time = val;
00059         }
00060         
00061         std::string exposure = Exposure_Time;
00062 
00063         return gcnew String(exposure.c_str());
00064     }
00065     catch(SVSTiffError e)
00066     {
00067         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage recieved SVSTiffError  " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00068         return gcnew String(e.what());
00069     }
00070     catch(...)
00071     {
00072         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage recieved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00073         throw "BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage recieved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName);
00074     }
00075 }
00076 String^ BigTiffDotNetReader::GetImageExtents(System::String ^fileName)
00077 {
00078     _log->Debug("Calling BigTiffDotNetReader::getExposure on filename : "+ gcnew String(fileName) );
00079     bool isAperio;
00080     try 
00081     {
00082         char* chars =  (char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(fileName)).ToPointer();
00083         std::string ofileName="temp";
00084         std::string lfileName=chars;
00085         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(chars));
00086         AperioFileManager svsmgr(lfileName.c_str() );
00087         std::map<std::string,std::string> metadata= svsmgr.getMetadata(0);
00088         
00089         std::string width="";
00090         std::string height="";
00091 
00092         for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator it = metadata.begin(); it != metadata.end(); it++)
00093         {
00094             std::string key = it->first.c_str();
00095             std::string val = it->second.c_str();
00096             std::cout<<key<<"   :   "<<val<<std::endl;
00097             if(key =="width")
00098                 width = val;
00099             if(key =="height")
00100                 height = val;
00101         }
00102         String^ w = gcnew String(width.c_str());
00103         String^ h = gcnew String(height.c_str());
00104         String^ extents = w+ "," + h;
00105         
00106         return extents;
00107 
00108     }
00109     catch(SVSTiffError e)
00110     {
00111         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage recieved SVSTiffError  " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00112     
00113     }
00114     catch(...)
00115     {
00116         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage recieved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00117         throw "BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage recieved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName);
00118     }

00120 bool BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage(String^ fileName)
00121 {
00122     _log->Info("Calling BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage on filename : "+ gcnew String(fileName) );
00123     bool isAperio;
00124     try 
00125     {
00126         char* chars =  (char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(fileName)).ToPointer();
00127         std::string ofileName="temp";
00128         std::string lfileName=chars;
00129         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(chars));
00130         AperioFileManager svsmgr(lfileName.c_str() );
00131         std::map<std::string,std::string> metadata= svsmgr.getMetadata(0);
00132         //Look through all of the tags for Aperio
00133         for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator it = metadata.begin(); it != metadata.end(); it++)
00134         {
00135             std::string search = it->first.c_str();
00136             while (search.find("Aperio", 0) != std::string::npos)
00137             {
00138                 size_t  pos = search.find("Aperio", 0); 
00139                 _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage returning true on filename: "+gcnew String(fileName) );
00140                 return true;
00141             }
00142             search = it->second.c_str();
00143 
00144             while (search.find("Aperio", 0) != std::string::npos)
00145             {
00146                 size_t  pos = search.find("Aperio", 0); 
00147                 _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage returning true on filename: "+gcnew String(fileName ) );
00148                 return true;
00149             }
00150         }
00151 
00152         _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage returning false on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00153         return false;
00154     }
00155     catch(SVSTiffError e)
00156     {
00157         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage recieved SVSTiffError  " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00158         return false;
00159     }
00160     catch(...)
00161     {
00162         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::isAperioImage recieved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00163         return false;
00164     }
00165 }

00167 void BigTiffDotNetReader::GetImageTiles(String^ fileName, String^ baseFileName)
00168 {
00169     try
00170     {
00171         char* chars =  ( char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(fileName)).ToPointer();
00172         std::string lfileName=chars;
00173 
00174         AperioFileManager svsmgr(lfileName.c_str());
00175 
00176         char* ofilepathchars =  ( char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(baseFileName)).ToPointer();
00177 
00178         std::string ofilename;
00179         try
00180         {
00181             ofilename = std::string(ofilepathchars ) ;
00182             svsmgr.ExtractImageTiles(ofilename.c_str() );
00183 
00184         }
00185         catch(SVSTiffError e)
00186         {
00187             _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages recieved SVSTiffError from  ExtractImageTiles" +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00188 
00189         }
00190         catch(...)
00191         {
00192             _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages recieved non SVSTiffError  from ExtractImageTiles" +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00193         }
00194 
00195         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(chars));
00196         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(ofilepathchars));
00197     }
00198 
00199     catch(SVSTiffError e)
00200     {
00201         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages receved SVSTiffError  " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00202 
00203     }
00204     catch(...)
00205     {
00206         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages receved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00207 
00208     }   
00209 }

00213 void BigTiffDotNetReader::GetImageROI(String^ fileName, String^ baseFileName, int^ x0,int^ y0, int^ w,int^h)
00214 {
00215     char* chars =  ( char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(fileName)).ToPointer();
00216     std::string lfileName=chars;
00217 
00218     AperioFileManager svsmgr(lfileName.c_str());
00219     char* ofilepathchars =  ( char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(baseFileName)).ToPointer();
00220 
00221     std::string ofilename;
00222     ofilename = std::string(ofilepathchars );
00223 
00224     try
00225     {
00226 
00227             try
00228         {
00229             
00230             svsmgr.ExtractMainResTile(ofilename.c_str() ,"",*x0,*y0, *w,*h);
00231             _log->Info("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetImageROI extracted image data " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) +" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" " );
00232 
00233         }
00234         catch(SVSTiffError e)
00235         {
00236             _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetImageROI recieved SVSTiffError from ExtractMainResTile " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) +" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" " );
00237 
00238             _log->Info("RETRY extract of image data " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) +" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" " );
00239             svsmgr.ExtractMainResTile(ofilename.c_str() ,"",*x0,*y0, *w-1,*h-1);
00240 
00241         }
00242         catch(...)
00243         {
00244             _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetImageROI recieved non SVSTiffError  from ExtractMainResTile" +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName)+" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" " );
00245 
00246             _log->Info("RETRY extract of image data " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) +" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" " );
00247             svsmgr.ExtractMainResTile(ofilename.c_str() ,"",*x0,*y0, *w-1,*h-1);
00248         }
00249 
00250         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(chars));
00251         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(ofilepathchars));
00252     }
00253 
00254     catch(SVSTiffError e)
00255     {
00256         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetImageROI receved SVSTiffError  " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) +" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" ");
00257 
00258         _log->Info("RETRY extract of image data " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) +" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" " );
00259         svsmgr.ExtractMainResTile(ofilename.c_str() ,"",*x0,*y0, *w-1,*h-1);
00260 
00261     }
00262     catch(...)
00263     {
00264         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetImageROI receved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) +" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" ");
00265 
00266         _log->Info("RETRY extract of image data " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) +" at ROI " +x0->ToString() +" " +y0->ToString() +" " +w->ToString() +" " +h->ToString() +" " );
00267         svsmgr.ExtractMainResTile(ofilename.c_str() ,"",*x0,*y0, *w,*h);
00268 
00269     }   
00270 }

00274 System::Collections::Hashtable^  BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages(String^ fileName, String^ baseFileName)
00275 {
00276 
00277     _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages called with source file : "+gcnew String(fileName) +" and destination directory :"+ gcnew String(baseFileName) );
00278 
00279     System::Collections::Hashtable^ files = gcnew System::Collections::Hashtable();
00280 
00281     try
00282     {
00283         char* chars =  ( char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(fileName)).ToPointer();
00284         std::string lfileName=chars;
00285 
00286         AperioFileManager svsmgr(lfileName.c_str());
00287 
00288         char* ofilepathchars =  ( char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(baseFileName)).ToPointer();
00289 
00290         std::string ofilename;
00291         std::string ofilename_thumb;
00292         std::string ofilename_label;
00293         std::string ofilename_macro;
00294         std::string ofilename_dir2;
00295         std::string ofilename_dir3;
00296 
00297         bool isThumb=false;
00298         bool isLabel=false;
00299         bool isMacro=false;
00300         bool isDir2=false;
00301         bool isDir3=false;
00302         
00303         try
00304         {
00305             //ofilename_thumb = std::string(ofilepathchars) + "_thumb.ppm";
00306             //_log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages calling getThumbnail");
00307             //isThumb=svsmgr.getThumbnail(ofilename_thumb.c_str() );
00308             //files->Add("thumbnail", gcnew String(ofilename_thumb.c_str()));
00309 
00310             //ofilename_label = std::string(ofilepathchars) + "_label.ppm";
00311             //_log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages calling getLabelImage");
00312             //isLabel =svsmgr.getLabelImage(ofilename_label.c_str() );
00313 
00314             //ofilename_macro = std::string(ofilepathchars) +  "_macro.ppm";
00315             //_log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages calling getWSIImage");
00316             //isMacro= svsmgr.getWSIImage(ofilename_macro.c_str() );
00317             
00318             ofilename_dir2 = std::string(ofilepathchars) +  "_dir2.tif";
00319             _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages calling getTiffDirImage for dir 2");
00320             isDir2= svsmgr.getTiffDirImage(2, ofilename_dir2.c_str());
00321             files->Add("dir2",gcnew String(ofilename_dir2.c_str()));
00322 
00323                         
00324             /*ofilename_dir3 = std::string(ofilepathchars) +  "_dir3.tif";
00325             _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages calling getTiffDirImage for dir 3");
00326             isDir3= svsmgr.getTiffDirImage(3, ofilename_dir3.c_str());*/
00327 
00328         }
00329         catch(SVSTiffError e)
00330         {
00331             _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages recieved SVSTiffError while trying to get thumbnail, label or WSI " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00332 
00333         }
00334         catch(...)
00335         {
00336             _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages recieved non SVSTiffError while trying to get thumbnail, label or WSI" +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00337 
00338         }
00339         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(chars));
00340         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(ofilepathchars));
00341 
00342     }   
00343 
00344     catch(SVSTiffError e)
00345     {
00346         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages receved SVSTiffError  " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00347 
00348     }
00349     catch(...)
00350     {
00351         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::GetSubImages receved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00352 
00353     }   
00354     return files;

00358 void BigTiffDotNetReader::SVSGetMetadata(String^ fileName, String^ baseFileName)
00359 {
00360     _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::SVSGetMetadata called with source file : "+gcnew String(fileName) +" and destination directory :"+ gcnew String(baseFileName) );
00361 
00362     char* chars =  (char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(fileName)).ToPointer();
00363     std::string lfileName=chars;
00364     try
00365     {
00366         AperioFileManager svsmgr(lfileName.c_str() );
00367 
00368         char* ofilepathchars =  ( char*)(Marshal::StringToHGlobalAnsi(baseFileName)).ToPointer();
00369 
00370         std::string ofilename;
00371 
00372         XmlDocument^ xmlDoc = gcnew XmlDocument();
00373         // Write down the XML declaration
00374         XmlDeclaration^ xmlDeclaration = xmlDoc->CreateXmlDeclaration(gcnew String("1.0"),gcnew String("utf-8"),gcnew String(""));
00375         // Create the root element
00376         XmlElement^ rootNode  = xmlDoc->CreateElement(gcnew String("TiffImage"));
00377         xmlDoc->InsertBefore(xmlDeclaration, xmlDoc->DocumentElement); 
00378         xmlDoc->AppendChild(rootNode);
00379 
00380         unsigned int numTifDirs=svsmgr.getNumberOfTiffDirs();
00381         int i=0;
00382         for(i=numTifDirs-1;i>=0;i--)
00383         {
00384             // Create a new <Category> element and add it to the root node
00385             XmlElement^ parentNode  = xmlDoc->CreateElement(gcnew String("Dir") );
00386             _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::SVSGetMetadata calling getMetadata");
00387             std::map<std::string,std::string> metadata= svsmgr.getMetadata(i);
00388             // Set attribute name and value!
00389             parentNode->SetAttribute(gcnew String("ID"), gcnew String(metadata["currentDir"].c_str() ) );
00390 
00391             _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::SVSGetMetadata setting metadata "+ gcnew String("ID")+"   "+  gcnew String(metadata["currentDir"].c_str() )) ;
00392 
00393             xmlDoc->DocumentElement->PrependChild(parentNode);
00394 
00395             unsigned int mapSize = metadata.size();
00396             unsigned int j=0;
00397 
00398             for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::const_iterator it = metadata.begin(); it != metadata.end(); it++,j++)
00399             {
00400                 std::cout << "key["<<j<<"] = " << it->first<<"\t\t\t\t\t   value = " << it->second << std::endl;
00401                 std::wstring widestringKey(it->first.begin(), it->first.end());
00402                 std::wstring widestringVal(it->second.begin(), it->second.end());
00403 
00404                 try
00405                 {
00406                     String^ key =gcnew String(it->first.c_str());
00407 
00408                     StringBuilder^ sb = gcnew StringBuilder(key);
00409 
00410                     sb->Replace(" ", "_");
00411 
00412                     XmlElement^ xmlNode  = xmlDoc->CreateElement(sb->ToString() );
00413                     //XmlElement^ xmlNode  = xmlDoc->CreateElement(gcnew String(widestringKey.c_str() ));
00414 
00415                     parentNode->AppendChild(xmlNode);
00416                     xmlNode->AppendChild(xmlDoc->CreateTextNode (gcnew String(it->second.c_str() ) ) ) ;
00417                     //xmlNode->AppendChild(xmlDoc->CreateTextNode (gcnew String(widestringVal.c_str() ) ) ) ;
00418 
00419                     _log->Debug("BigTiffDotNetReader::SVSGetMetadata setting metadata "+ key + "   "+  gcnew String(it->second.c_str() ) ) ;
00420 
00421 
00422                 }
00423                 catch(...)
00424                 {
00425                     _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::SVSGetMetadata receved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00426                 }
00427             }
00428             
00429         }
00430 
00431         // Save to the XML file
00432         ofilename = std::string(ofilepathchars) + "_meta.xml";
00433         xmlDoc->Save(gcnew String(ofilename.c_str() ) );
00434 
00435         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(chars));
00436         Marshal::FreeHGlobal(IntPtr(ofilepathchars));
00437     }
00438 
00439     catch(SVSTiffError e)
00440     {
00441         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::SVSGetMetadata receved SVSTiffError  " +  gcnew String(e.what()) + " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00442     }
00443     catch(...)
00444     {
00445         _log->Error("BigTiffDotNetReader::SVSGetMetadata receved non SVSTiffError  " +  " on  filename :"+gcnew String( fileName) );
00446 
00447     }   
00448 
00449 }
